/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, its rays filtering through the leaves of the trees, adding a warm glow to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the everyday beauty of this bustling city.
